item.description:
Lets's attend the free Shakespeare in the Park Theatre production followed by the Greeley Park Art Show.

Each year the NAAA hosts the Greeley Park Art Show for artists to sell their fine art. Artists from the New England area come to this landmark downtown Nashua park and set up their artist stands to display their work to thousands of visitors over the two day event.

http://www.naaasite.c...

This years play is "Much Ado About Nothing". Much Ado About Nothing is a comedy by William Shakespeare. First published in 1600, it was likely first performed in the winter of 1598-1599 and it remains one of Shakespeare's most enduring plays on stage. Stylistically, it shares many characteristics with modern romantic comedies including two pairs of lovers: the romantic leads, Claudio and Hero, and their comic counterparts, Benedick and Beatrice.

http://en.wikipedia.o...
http://www.nashuathea...

The play starts at 12:00, but we need to be there by 11:00 to get good seats. You need to bring a lawn chair, bug spray and snacks as desired.
item.name: Arts in the Park/Shakespeare in the Park
